title: Implement authentication API endpoints
description:
Create the REST API endpoints for user registration, login, and logout.

Changes needed:
1. Create registration endpoint with validation
2. Create login endpoint with token generation
3. Create logout endpoint
4. Add Swagger documentation
5. Implement proper error responses

Files to modify:
- backend/src/modules/auth/controllers/auth.controller.ts
- backend/src/modules/auth/dto/signup.dto.ts
- backend/src/modules/auth/dto/token.dto.ts

Testing Requirements:
1. E2E test for successful registration
2. E2E test for successful login
3. E2E test for logout
4. Test invalid input handling
